headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: custom_audience_id Conditional
parameters.description: You need pass in either locations or custom_audience_id in the request. Custom audience ID. Note : When custom_audience_id is specified, either selected_audience or locations cannot be used. Otherwise, an error will occur. The audience ID you input must belong to your specified advertisers.

parameters.name: locations Conditional
parameters.description: You need pass in either locations or custom_audience_id in the request. Locations. Max size : 5 Note : When locations is specified, custom_audience_id cannot be used. Otherwise, an error will occur.

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Country code. See Appendix-Location IDs for details.

parameters.name: location_ids
parameters.description: Location IDs. By default, all location IDs under the specified country code are selected. The location IDs you input must fall within the range of the specified country code.

parameters.name: dimensions
parameters.description: Use this field to control which API response dimensions are returned. Enum values: age , gender , country , top_regions , operating_system , operating_system_version , device_price , top_interests , bottom_interests , engagement , ad_interest_categories , and top_hashtags . Note : Currently, you can input only one dimension for each API call.

parameters.name: selected_audience
parameters.description: The audience you want to filter for.

parameters.name: top_regions_country_code Conditional
parameters.description: Required if you have input top_regions in the dimensions field and specified locations . When the dimension is top_regions , the corresponding return fields will contain the sub-regions within the country you specified in locations .

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: Codes of the languages that you want to target. For the list of language codes supported, see Enumeration - Language Code . You can also get language codes via /tool/language/ .

parameters.name: age_groups
parameters.description: Age groups you want to target. For enum values, see Enumeration - Age Group .

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Genders that you want to target. Enum values: GENDER_FEMALE , GENDER_MALE . If you don't pass anything, it means that you want to target both males and females.

parameters.name: device_price_ranges
parameters.description: Targeting device price range. 10000 means 1000+. The numbers must be in multiples of 50.

parameters.name: min_ios_version
parameters.description: Minimum iOS version. For enum values, see Enumeration - Minimum iOS Version .

parameters.name: min_android_version
parameters.description: Minimum Android version. For enum values, see Enumeration - Minimum Android Version .

parameters.name: operating_systems Conditional
parameters.description: Required if you've specified either min_ios_version or min_android_version . Device operating systems that you want to target. Enum values: ANDROID , IOS . Only one value is allowed. If you don't pass anything, it means that you want to target both Android and iOS systems.

parameters.name: interest_category_ids
parameters.description: Interest classification. Use /tool/interest_category/ to get a list of available interest categories. Use /tool/target_recommend_tags/ to get a list of recommended interest categories.

parameters.name: video_action_category_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the video action categories. Use /tool/action_category/ to get a list of available video interaction categories ( action_scene = VIDEO_RELATED in the response). Use /tool/targeting_category/recommend/ to get a list of recommended video interaction categories ( scene = VIDEO_RELATED in the response).

parameters.name: creator_action_category_ids
parameters.description: IDs of the creator action categories. Use /tool/action_category/ to get a list of available creator interaction categories ( action_scene = CREATOR_RELATED in the response). Use /tool/targeting_category/recommend/ to get a list of recommended creator interaction categories ( scene = CREATOR_RELATED in the response).

parameters.name: hashtag_action_category_ids
parameters.description: Hashtag IDs. Use /tool/hashtag/recommend/ to get a list of recommended hashtag IDs, or use /tool/hashtag/get/ to get hashtags by IDs.

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log id of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: age
fields.description: Age. Returned if you have input age in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are two fields that convey specific information. See the code example below for details. label : Age group label. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the label. It is of the number data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Age data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Age data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: gender
fields.description: Gender. Returned if you have input gender in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are two fields that convey specific information. label : Gender label. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the label. It is of the number data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Gender data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request.

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Gender data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: country
fields.description: Country. Returned if you have input country in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are two fields that convey specific information. label : Country name. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the country. It is of the number data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Country data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request.

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Country data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: top_regions
fields.description: Country. Returned if you have input top_regions in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are several fields that convey specific information. label : Region name. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the region. It is of the number data type. region_id : Region ID. It is of string data type. country_code : Country code. It is of string data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Region data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request.

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Region data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: operating_system
fields.description: Operating system. Returned if you have input operating_system in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are several fields that convey specific information. label : This field is used to denote the operating system. It is of string data type. rate : This field is utilized to denote the percentage of the operating system. It is of the number data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Operating system data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request .

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Operating system data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: operating_system_version
fields.description: Operating system version. Returned if you have input operating_system_version in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are several fields that convey specific information. label : Operating system version. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the operating system version. It is of the number data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Operating system version data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request.

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Operating system version data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: device_price
fields.description: Device price. Returned if you have input device_price in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are several fields that convey specific information. label : Device price. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the device price. It is of the number data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Device price data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request .

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Device price data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: top_interests
fields.description: Top interests. Returned if you have input top_interests in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are several fields that convey specific information. label : Interest category label. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the interest category label. It is of the number data type. ad_interest_category : This field is used to denote the first-level interest category. It is of string data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Interest category data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request.

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Interest category data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: bottom_interests
fields.description: Bottom interests. Returned if you have input bottom_interests in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are several fields that convey specific information. label : Interest category label. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the interest category label. It is of the number data type. ad_interest_category : This field is used to denote the first-level interest category. It is of string data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Interest category data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request.

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Interest category data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: ad_interest_categories
fields.description: Interest categories. Returned if you have input ad_interest_categories in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are several fields that convey specific information. label : Interest category label. It is of string data type. rate : Percentage of the interest category label. It is of the number data type. type : Level of the interest category. It is of string data type. Example: "first".

fields.name: all
fields.description: Interest category data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request .

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Interest category data of the audience you filtered for.

fields.name: top_hashtags
fields.description: Top hashtags. Returned if you have input top_hashtags in dimensions in your request.

fields.name: hashtag_id
fields.description: Hashtag ID.

fields.name: hashtag_name
fields.description: Hashtag name.

fields.name: count
fields.description: The number of times the hashtag is used.

fields.name: engagement
fields.description: Engagement metrics. Returned if you have input engagement in dimensions in your request. Within all and selected objects listed below, there are several fields that convey specific information. daily_sessions : Average number of app opens per user per day. It is of the number data type. daily_session_duration_in_minutes : Average number of minutes used per user per day. It is of the number data type. daily_video_views : Average number of video views per user per day. It is of the number data type. daily_comments : Average number of comments per user per day. It is of the number data type. daily_likes : Average number of likes per user per day. It is of the number data type. daily_shares : Average number of shares per user per day. It is of the number data type. total_video_uploads : Average uploads of selected/all users per day. It is of the number data type.

fields.name: all
fields.description: Engagement data of all audience, that is, the audience for the selected locations. In certain scenarios, all will be returned as null. These include instances when: When your audience size is less than 1,000. When you specify custom_audience_id in your request.

fields.name: selected
fields.description: Engagement data of the audience you filtered for.
